attributes.action: That all Junior Doctors get specialized training in Fibromyalgia and ME/CFS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These two extremely painful and dibilitating illness's need alot more research but the main thing is educating not only Doctor's and Nurses but also Physiotherapists to give them the knowledge in how to treat us all. Also new and upcoming Junior Doctors and Nurses too should also have training in these illness's. Until they do, this illness will never be fully understood or recognised not just for those that have been diagnosed but for those that are trying to get a diagnosis now or in the future.
